data.name: textBox3.Text
data.value: Sapphire Sands Resort beckons with the allure of pristine beaches and luxurious indulgence. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of sapphire-blue waters and golden sands. Our resort offers a sanctuary where relaxation and sophistication blend seamlessly for a truly rejuvenating escape.

data.name: textBox2.Text
data.value: Welcome to Azure Escape Resort, where the tranquil beauty of azure blue skies meets the luxury of an unforgettable getaway. Nestled amidst breathtaking landscapes, our resort offers a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. Immerse yourself in the serenity of our azure-themed haven, where each moment is a retreat into pure bliss.

data.name: hotelDescription9.Text
data.value: Opulent Oasis Hotel is a lavish escape into opulence, where the allure of luxury is unmatched. From lavish accommodations to exquisite amenities, our hotel is a true oasis for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

data.name: hotelDescription8.Text
data.value: Radiant Rendezvous Hotel beckons you to embark on a journey into enchantment. From the moment you step through our doors, a world of refined luxury unfolds before you. The Radiant Rendezvous is more than a hotel; it is an immersive experience meticulously crafted for those who seek a rendezvous with extravagance.

data.name: hotelDescription7.Text
data.value: Discover a celestial haven where luxury meets the stars. Celestial Suites invites you to experience unparalleled comfort in a setting that transcends the ordinary. Immerse yourself in opulence, surrounded by celestial wonders that elevate your stay to new heights.

data.name: hotelDescription6.Text
data.value: Velvet Vista Hotel welcomes you to a world of plush elegance and panoramic views. Our hotel is a sensory delight, where every corner is adorned with sophistication. Unwind in style, enjoying the velvety comforts and breathtaking vistas that make your stay an unforgettable experience.

data.name: hotelDescription5.Text
data.value: Pinnacle Paradise Hotel stands at the summit of luxury, offering an unparalleled experience in hospitality. From breathtaking views to impeccable service, our hotel is a pinnacle of opulence. Immerse yourself in a paradise of refined indulgence and exquisite comfort.

data.name: hotelDescription4.Text
data.value: Step into the Tranquil Oasis Lodge, where peace and comfort converge. Surrounded by lush landscapes, our lodge is a retreat into serenity. Immerse yourself in the tranquil ambiance, enjoying the harmonious blend of nature and hospitality.

data.name: hotelDescription10.Text
data.value: Regal Respite Inn invites you to experience regal comfort in a charming haven. Immerse yourself in the regal ambiance, where each detail reflects a commitment to luxury and tranquility. Your respite begins in the lap of regal indulgence.Immerse yourself in the radiant ambiance that characterizes the soul of our hotel. Luxurious amenities await at every turn, promising a seamless blend of comfort and sophistication. From the opulent spa to the rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the city, the Radiant Rendezvous is a haven for those who appreciate the finer things in life

data.name: textBox4.Text
data.value: Majestic Mirage Lodge is a haven of enchantment, where majesty and mirage converge in perfect harmony. Surrounded by awe-inspiring landscapes, our lodge offers a majestic retreat into luxury. Experience the allure of the extraordinary as you indulge in the grandeur of Majestic Mirage Lodge.
